name: Arrow Fire - Archery is Hard
description:
Unleash your SUPER HUMAN aim!

ARROW FIRE is a surreal journey of an archer to smash the ice and end the eternal winter. It requires focus, concentration, and timing to break the beautiful ice wheels.

Ever fancied yourself as a bit of a Robin Hood? Wanna bust out your inner Katniss? Well, you will like Arrow Fire with 100+ fun levels.
